title: Typotheque Promotion: 50% off
content:
Typefoundry **Typotheque** celebrates its first 10 years with a special promotion (50% off all type) on the 22d of September. Check out the conditions here:

[http://www.typotheque.com/site/show\_email.php?id=33](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015203410/http:/www.typotheque.com/site/show_email.php?id=33 "http://www.typotheque.com/site/show\_email.php?id=33")
author: Bert Vanderveen
